name: The Curse of Fungi
description:
Clavi is a young traveler who has been inflicted by a strange curse. Travel through a dangerous forest and fight the various monsters that hide in it. Throughout this 2D platformer you will meet new characters and fight yourself free from The Curse of Fungi.

Credit to   Keusu for some music : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqy5Vo3YGbJ47RPy8HH3e0w

Controls: (keyboard or xbox controller )

  •     Movement: WASD or left joystick
  •     Jump: Spacebar or A button
  •     Airjump: Spacebar or A button while in air
  •     Quickfall: S or down on joystick (player falls slightly faster)
  •     Sprint: Left ctrl or both triggers 
  •     Melee: Mouse button or X button
  •     Melee up: Mouse button and W or X button and left joystick up
  •     Ground pound: (in air) S or left joystick down + melee button
  •     Pause: Escape or menu
